papers.title: As America ages, it is sleeping longer and longer
papers.desc: Middle-aged men, however, get much less rest than the average

papers.title: How the EU is fighting to protect the rule of law in Poland
papers.desc: Without the rule of law, says Angela Merkel, the EU is no longer the EU

papers.title: A system of gender self-identification would put women at risk
papers.desc: It would threaten single-sex spaces and female political autonomy, writes Kristina Harrison, a political campaigner

papers.title: Gender identity needs to be based on objective evidence rather than feelings
papers.desc: If we abandon the testimony of experts, we may find ourselves at the mercy of whoever shouts loudest, writes Debbie Hayton, a trans teacher

papers.title: Self-declaration would bring Britain into line with international best practice
papers.desc: And grant trans people maximum dignity and autonomy, writes Vic Valentine of the Scottish Trans Alliance

papers.title: “Three Lions” perfectly captures the masochism of supporting England
papers.desc: The country’s favourite football song is the only one to acknowledge fandom’s inevitable pains

papers.title: Angela Merkel reaches a deal on asylum-seekers to keep her government together
papers.desc: The agreement does not so much resolve the underlying dispute, as displace it
